original_text: And immediately something like scales fell from his eyes, and he regained his sight. Then he rose and was baptized;
korean_text: 즉시 사울의 눈에서 비늘 같은 것이 벗어져 다시 보게 된지라 일어나 세례를 받고

sentences.original_text: And immediately something like scales fell from his eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 즉시 비늘 같은 것이 그의 눈에서 떨어졌습니다
